title: pwn Abloy Easy: Case study if it is possible to pick the latest Abloy mechanical lock model Abloy Easy released in 2021
synopsis: All Finns know that it is not possible to pick Abloy locks such as Classic, Exec, Sento: - I have picked them all. In this presentation you will learn the operation principle of Abloy latest mechanical lock model Abloy Easy and how it can be picked.

speakers.name: Petri Maksimainen
speakers.bio:
When Finland faced the first round of covid pandemic I did not get hit by covid, but I got hit by the locksport interest. Since then I have pwned several lock types, including those different Abloy lock types. 

In the locksport scene I play with a nickname 'Idanhurja'. Lock Pickers United awarded me with "black belt" -picker status in 2021. I have shared some of my learning in youtube. 

I am also interested in cyber security in hands on fashion. I completed pwn.college and been playing in different CTF-competitions. 

My professional life so far has not been related to cyber security / physical security, but I am always open for interesting opportunities.
